sessionTitle: Select a session, an user identification number and the enviroment to be used to continue...
categoryTitle: Choose the categories that will be used to classify information objects.

browsingModeTitle: Select a Information Object browsing mode
browsingModeDescription:
Local mode lets the user choose files from folders in local drives as Information Objects.
Online mode lets the user choose a text file with urls to be shown as Information Objects.
(Online mode requires access to internet)
fileLocalTitle: Please select the files or folders to be displayed.
fileOnlineTitle: Please select a url text file or folders containing url text files.
displaymodeTitle: Select display mode to be used to show the Information Objects.
displaymodeDesc:
Plane mode displays items in front of the user in a box-shaped form.
Radial mode displays items around the user in a spherical-shaped form.
Volumetric option enables the user to swap between layers of information Objects.
dimensionplanexTitle: How many columns of Information Objects will be displayed?
dimensionplaneyTitle: How many rows of Information Objects will be displayed?
dimensionplanezTitle: How many layers of Information Objects will be displayed?
dimensionradialxTitle: How many elements in each Information Object ring will be displayed? (At least 3 per ring)
dimensionradialyTitle: How many Information Object rings will be displayed?
dimensionradialzTitle: How many layers of Information Object rings will be displayed?
postloadTitle: Press next to launch the session.
righthandSelectorEmpty: Select an Information Object to categorize.
